alert.note: Alert for Labette; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 1:16PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Labette and Neosho Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 109 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm in Parsons which was producing penny sized hail and moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Oswego, Erie, Chetopa, Altamont, St. Paul, Thayer, Edna, Mound Valley, Galesburg, Bartlett, Labette, Lake Parsons, Dennis, South Mound and Big Hill Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
